price: 111. Waxay dhammaan wejiyaduna u khushuuci (Allaah), Noolaha Daa’inka ah, Irsaaqaha iyo Maamulaha waxa uunka jira oo dhan.  Waxaana khasaaray kii geystay dulmi22.
arabic: ۞ وَعَنَتِ ٱلۡوُجُوهُ لِلۡحَيِّ ٱلۡقَيُّومِۖ وَقَدۡ خَابَ مَنۡ حَمَلَ ظُلۡمٗا
footnotes: 22. Qofkii gef ka galay Alle ee yidhi wiil buu leeyahay ama ilmo ama ku tilmaamay sifad xun ama gef ka galay mid ka mid ah uumankiisa.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waʿanati al-wujūhu lil'ḥayyi al-qayūmi waqad khāba man ḥamala ẓul'man
